commit_list.message: XML report now shows failures with the correct error messages.
Added basic support to generate a xml report (should be compatible to junit)
Replaced __FUNCTION__ with __func__ (which is a part of C99).
Reformated functions.
Added statistic structures, added function to check stats and updated stdout printout.
Moved include statements.
Refactored allocation of Test struct, printout of result to stdout, create stup for xml result, created internal header.
Moved stest files to a more correct directory structure.
Added support for cppcheck (again).
Renamed seatest to stest.
Added time measurements for each test.
Fixed boolean logic in simple test result.
Updated asserts to save result and added simple printout of result.
Rewrote most of seatest to a new structure and updated buffer tests to it (no test result yet).
Updated to waf 1.6.4.
Added a second alternativ.
Added TODO.
Merge remote branch 'github/master'
Started to create base macros for implementation as in ex.c.
Had to add a def of test group, not nice but couldn't come up with an alternative.
Updated example, removed some questions.
Added a draft for a component based framework.
Added TODO file.
Added dependency to glib-2.0 on all targets.
Added README file ( something that github really wants ).
Added run cmd and added unittest bin as global variable.
Added some example files on what I have been working toward.
Added a start for a separate test registration structure.
Changed how test suite registration is done.
Added some simple utility functions to a environment script.
Added correct time mesurement.
Changed variable type.
Fixed a printf warning, expanded macro's to several lines to improve readability, converted seatest.h to unix fileformat.
Arguments to strstr was in the wrong order and return value should be NULL when substr isn't found.
Added test to that tries to delete a NULL pointer.
Added one more test to create_delete_buffer, added test of buffer length with setup and teardown functions.
Added cflags to seatest, added Wextra to all targets.
Changed function definitions for function argument to 'const char*' from 'char*'.
Added a simple test to create and delete a buffer.
Changed the structure of the buffer test file.
Commented out redundant function.

Updated wscript, added a couple of unittests.

* Added seatest, a simple c unittest library ( needs some work )
* Added a couple of dummy unittests to see that it works.
Updated to latest waf version, requires more work for UT.
Added initial version, only contains a working buffer.
Changed how cppcheck is called.
